description: Manages site-to-site VPN gateways on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

account.description: Account the VPN gateway is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the VPN gateway is related to.

domain.description: Domain the VPN gateway is related to.

zone.description: Name of the zone the VPC is related to. If not set, default zone is used.
